answers.text:
Hi Alex,
Thank you for the great question on reducing idling of light-duty vehicles. While I have not found any articles on specifically what equipment to install on these vehicles to reduce emissions I have found an innovative initiatives that some cities are using to reduce emissions from idling in light-duty vehicles. 
•   On page 20 of the City of Napa’s Sustainability there is a discussion of their efforts to reduce idling in their community from light-duty vehicles. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/304975
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Alex Rivera
text:
Hi all,
Is there anyone out there with experience in installation of idling reduction equipment in light duty vehicles? I've come across a number of resources, but there doesn't seem to be anything particularly useful for light duty vehicles, most resources are dedicated to heavy duty. Any assistance provided is appreciated.
title: Idling Reduction Equipment
